strings.SS2_EXECUTIONER_DESCRIPTION:
The Executioner is a high-risk, high-reward survivor that's all about racking up an endless kill count.

<color=#CCD3E0> < ! > Use Service Pistol to score some kills, with each kill building up an even stronger Ion Burst.

< ! > Ion Burst is all or nothing, so carefully choose when to fire the barrage.

< ! > Execution is a great crowd control AND single target tool. Don't forget that its damage depends on how many targets it hits!

< ! > If you find yourself getting swarmed, Crowd Dispersion can get enemies off your back fast.
strings.SS2_EXECUTIONER_OUTRO_FLAVOR: ..and so he left, an empty shell of armor drenched in blood.
strings.SS2_EXECUTIONER_OUTRO_FAILURE: ..and so he vanished, escaping the inevitable.
strings.SS2_EXECUTIONER_LORE:
Death is inevitable. It comes for us all. Some may try to evade it, or run from it. But death arrives all the same. Death, however, is simply the cost of war. And death in glorious combat is one of the best deaths a man could ask for.

But, as always, some would seek to run from death. We call them by many names. Deserters, cowards, turncoats. Each and every one of them, traitors to the cause. These traitors must be punished for their crime. And that punishment: in an ironic twist, is the very thing they tried to avoid.

Death will come for them. Not as a robed spectre with a scythe. Not in a trench coat, holding a revolver. Not as a sickness, nor the wear of time. No. For them, death will come bearing lustrous battlegarb, with service pistol loaded, and ion manipulators fully charged.
strings.SS2_KEYWORD_FEAR: <style=cKeywordName>Fear</style><style=cSub>Afflicted enemies flee danger with <style=cIsUtility>{1}%</style> increased movement speed, and take <style=cIsDamage>{0}%</style> extra damage.</style>
strings.SS2_KEYWORD_EXECUTING: <style=cKeywordName>Executing</style><style=cSub>Deals doubled damage if no more than 1 enemy is hit.</style>
strings.SS2_KEYWORD_RECHARGING: <style=cKeywordName>Recharging</style><style=cSub>Killing enemies restores charges of this skill, depending on the strength of the slain enemy. Doubled charges with kills from Execution.</style>
strings.SS2_KEYWORD_ENERGIZING: <style=cKeywordName>Energizing</style><style=cSub>Reduces all skill cooldowns by <style=cIsUtility>{0}.0s</style> for every slain enemy.</style>
strings.SS2_EXECUTIONER_PASSIVE_DESC: Charge Ion Burst by <style=cIsUtility>killing enemies</style>. Defeating a boss <style=cIsUtility>restocks all charges</style>.
strings.SS2_EXECUTIONER_TASER_DESCRIPTION: Fire arcs of lightning forward for <style=cIsDamage>{0}% damage</style>.
strings.SS2_EXECUTIONER_SWINGAXE_DESCRIPTION: Swing your axe for <style=cIsDamage>% damage</style>. <style=cIsUtility>Each Secondary charge grants 4% maximum health in shield</style>.
strings.SS2_EXECUTIONER_IONGUN_DESCRIPTION: Consume all charges to fire a barrage of ionized bullets, dealing <style=cIsDamage>{0}% damage</style> each.
strings.SS2_EXECUTIONER_IONBLAST_DESCRIPTION: Fire a blast of raw ion energy for <style=cIsDamage>% damage</style>. Can be <style=cIsUtility>charged</style>, using multiple charges at once. <style=cIsUtility>Restocks charges for every enemy you kill, depending on strength</style>.
strings.SS2_EXECUTIONER_DASH_DESCRIPTION: Boost forward and <style=cIsUtility>fear</style> all nearby enemies for <style=cIsUtility>{0} seconds</style>.
strings.SS2_EXECUTIONER_AXE_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsUtility>Energizing</style>. Launch up and slam a massive ion axe downwards for <style=cIsDamage>{0}% damage</style>, dealing <style=cIsUtility>less damage</style> for each enemy hit.
strings.SS2_EXECUTIONER_AXESCEPTER_DESCRIPTION: Launch into the air and slam downward with your ion axe for <style=cIsDamage>3000% damage</style>.
strings.SS2_EXECUTIONER_ARMOR_DESCRIPTION: Equip a suit of ionized armor, giving <style=cIsUtility>60 armor</style> and <style=cIsDamage>supercharging</style> your secondary skill for <style=cIsDamage>4</style> seconds.
strings.SS2_EXECUTIONER_ARMORSCEPTER_NAME: Equip a suit of ionized armor, giving <style=cIsUtility>80 armor</style> and <style=cIsDamage>supercharging</style> your secondary skill for <style=cIsDamage>4</style> seconds. Killing enemies <style=cIsUtility>fears</style> nearby enemies for 4 seconds.
